Necross/ Splattercannon:
 
Splattercannon recovers and moves to provide cover fire for the two Sweeps and Necross.  All four continue firing on the Maximals.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Rodimus/BlackFang:

both bots covered and fired back



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Splattercannon/ Necross:
>  
> Splattercannon had a little trouble with handling both Rodimus and 
Blackfang.  A Sweep came and relieved him, so he may catch his 
breath.
>  
> Necross had recovered and took over where Splattercannon left 
off.  He trained his weapons on the two maximals and opened fire 
again.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackFang/Rodimus:
> 
> Blackfang resulted wounded when he tried to avoid Splattercannon's 
> shot and he was stunned, Rodimus looked that and he quickly opened 
> fire againts Unircron minion
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Necross/ Splattercannon/ Sweeps:
> >  
> > Necross prepared to fire another volley when Blackfang opened 
> fire.  Necross shielded his optics as Splattercannon came to his 
> aid, opening fire on Blackfang.  A Sweep helped Necross away for 
the 
> moment so the minion could recover while Splattercannon bought him 
> time.
> > 
> > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Rodimus/BlackFang:
> > 
> > Rodimus a drop of acyd reached ROdimus in his arm, he fell 
wouded 
> and wsitha terribly pain, but he didn't like surrender... he had 
to 
> protect his fellows, his base and most important his family. 
> BlackFang Shouted furious and opended fire against Necross.
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley 
<bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Necross/ ????:
> >   
> > Necross landed and transformed back into robot mode.  His 
puncture 
> wounds had mostly recovered by now, but his energy reserve was 
> noticably affected.  This enraged him, no opponent had ever 
dropped 
> his power by such a degree, and this would be the last time.  He 
> opened fire with both his weapons, acid blaster on Rodimus and 
> missile blaster on Cryaltron.
> >   
> > Then, the sixth minion of Unicron decended, with a few of her 
> Sweeps in tow.  The Sweep commander landed and looked over the 
> battles in progress.  Her interest was perticularly drawn to the 
> fight between Malice and Nightstrike.  She took a step closer and 
> watched he two fight in interest, while the Sweeps went to aid the 
> other minions.
> >
